title: Coronation of Napoleon
post: Today our great leader has been crowned emperor of the French.

title: A day that will live in infamy
post: Curse the British! Curse the Prussians! Today is a day of great sorrow

title: Praise Louis Napoleon!
post: Today the nephew of Napoleon has been elected president of our French Republic. Will he lead us to glory?

title: No
post: Napoleon III has forfeited to the Prussians at the Battle of Sedan. Sadness and disappointment siezes the french people.
